level.heading: REVIEW BY THE BOARD OF ELECTIONS (ยง 3-3504)

level.text: Any party adversely affected by any order of the Director may obtain review of the order by filing with the Board of Elections a request for a hearing de novo.
The request pursuant to ยง 3504.1 shall be filed:
Within fifteen (15) days from the issuance by the Director of an order; and
In accordance with Chapter 4 of this title.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 D.C. Reg. 3161, 3200 (May 22, 1998); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1402 (February 8, 2013).
